nodes.text: A special breed of mushroom grew in the excess condensation of moisture vaporators on the desert planet Tatooine. The breed was used as an ingredient in the dish Tatooine Terrine and its juices provided moisture in the recipe. At some point following the Battle of Takodana in 34 ABY, the Artiodac chef Strono Tuggs included the mushrooms in a recipe for Tatooine Terrine in his cookbook, The Official Black Spire Outpost Cookbook.

The mushroom breed was mentioned in the real-life cookbook Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge: The Official Black Spire Outpost Cookbook, which was written by Marc Sumerak and Chelsea Monroe-Cassel. The out-of-universe recipe given for Tatooine Terrine requires a quarter ounce of dried mushrooms of the readers choice.
